alert.note: Alert for Adams; Blackford; Grant; Huntington; Jay; Wabash; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 19 at 2:55PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Wabash, Grant, Blackford, Huntington, Wells, Adams and Jay Counties through 345 PM EST... At 254 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Andrews to near Fairmount. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marion, Huntington, Bluffton, Decatur, Portland, Hartford City, Gas City, Berne, Upland, Ossian, Fairmount, Dunkirk, Montpelier, Jonesboro, Redkey, Geneva, Sweetser, Andrews, Markle and La Fontaine. This includes Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 252 and 293. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EST for northeastern and east central Indiana...and west central Ohio.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Blackford; Grant; Huntington; Jay; Wabash; Wells
